Privacy Policy

We process your personal data ourselves or may have processed data by external data processors that process the data exclusively on our behalf and in accordance with our instructions.
The data is stored and processed for technical reasons.
We might also use the data for statistical purposes.
We use this information to ensure the security of our web pages, to measure the effectiveness of internet advertising, to compile statistics and to measure the activities on the website with the aim of improving our offer.

Generally, we will process your name and/or company name, address, email address, phone numbers and further information that might be required to administer your use of the Customer's services.

This website uses cookies.
We might also use third-party cookies, particularly in connection with the use of analytics tools, tracking and targeting technologies.
We use cookies for various purposes, which are described below.
We use cookies on our website.
We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic.
We use our own cookies, in particular functional cookies, to make our website more user-friendly, to simplify registration and logging into the platform, to provide certain functions, to store the consent to or rejection of cookies and to ensure the security of our website and our systems.
When we send a newsletter, we collect data about the sending and use of the newsletter.
We collect data about your use of our platform, including the use by your authorised users and administrators.
If you are an End User that is using our Customer's services provided through our platform, we will process the data required by our Customer to provide its services to you.
